content.description:
Start with your left hand on a crimp sidepull and your right hand on a sloper pinch that doesn't really seem like a hold. Move straight up, and top out as for

Eye For An Eye

.
content.location: It is the furthest left line on Rain Shadow Boulder.

content.description: Start with both hand in the black slots low, go up to the jug, then follow the best holds up to the top. This is the most obvious line on the boulder.
content.location:
Once past

Day 1

, conintue hiking downcanyon

and slightly right

until you find the big overhanging boulder, pass the left side of the

boulder, and angle towards the hill. Cross the creek, and once through the trees, the Rain Shadow Boulder will come into view a little ways up the hill.

content.description: This is the higher and maybe better start. Start with a left hand sidepull pinch and a right hand sidepull. Go up to the sloper, and then throw out right. This is on a small boulder, but it has a very cool, polished sloper.
content.location: It is on the first boulder you get to after the 4x4 tracks.

content.description: Start with your left hand on a downpull next to the tree and your right hand in an undercling. Make a hard move to a right hand sidepull, flip your left hand, heel over, then go up to the sloper. The crux is jumping out right off the sloper.
content.location: This is on the first boulder you come to on the 4x4 track.

content.description:
Force of Habit is the left entrance to

Creature of Habit

. Start standing on the far left of the sloper rail. Traverse right for a few feet, then climb up the same finish as

Creature...

.
content.location:
It is on the left side of the Scott Boulder.

The location of the boulder is:

https://goo.gl/maps/m3nFVdQrC8UahQbX8

.

content.description:
Start on the big, diagonal jug on

Rain Shadow

, and move up and left through crimps and pinches, topping out on the path of least resistance.
content.location: It is on Rain Shadow Boulder.

content.description: Start sitting on the incuts on the shield, move up and left to the sloper rail, then go up. This is the first problem developed in the area.
content.location: Once at Hollow Heart Boulder, follow the faint trail downcanyon until this boulder is reached. It is 5 minutes from Hollow Heart Boulder.

content.description:
Creature of Habit is an amazing new highball behind Big Bend Campground.

Start with a double undercling, with a left incut crimp undercling and jug right undercling. Go up and left to a tall finish on a thin slab. The slab is only about V2, but it is thin and a little tricky. The climb was rehearsed on a rope before the first ascent.
content.protection: Pads and spotters who like you.
content.location:
It is on the right side of Scott Boulder.

From

Day 1

, head up the hill. This boulder is halfway up the large hill, on the left side of the saddle. The top of the boulder can be seen from the road.

A pin to the boulder:

https://goo.gl/maps/m3nFVdQrC8UahQbX8

.

content.description:
Start on the big diagonal jug on

Rain Shadow

, move up and slightly left as for

Rainmaker

, but instead, top out straight up on poor crimps.
content.location: It is on Rain Shadow Boulder.
